SELECT a1.SEASON_NO , a1.SEASON_TITLE, a1.SEASON_STATUS , a1.SEASON_CONTENT,a2.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname,a1.SEASON_REGDATE,a1.SEASON_PICK FROM KOCO_SEASON a1, KOCO_USERS a2 WHERE 1=1 AND a1.USER_NO = a2.USER_NO
AND a1.SEASON_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND a1.SEASON_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND a2.USER_NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY a1.SEASON_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KOCO_SEASON a1, KOCO_USERS a2 WHERE 1=1 AND a1.USER_NO = a2.USER_NO
AND SEASON_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND SEASON_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND USER_NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
SELECT * FROM KOCO_SEASON ORDER BY SEASON_NO DESC
